title: Livorno
summary: Livorno (Italian: [liˈvorno] (listen)) is a port city on the Ligurian Sea[2] on the western coast of Tuscany, Italy.[3] It is the capital of the Province of Livorno, having a population of 158,493 residents in December 2017. It is traditionally known in English as Leghorn (pronounced /lɛˈɡɔːrn/ leg-ORN,[4][5] /ˈlɛɡhɔːrn/ LEG-horn[6] or /ˈlɛɡərn/ LEG-ərn).[7][8][9]
